Texts.Chs: 看起来有点... 恶心。 无论如何，我已经把它浓缩成一束神经，你可以把它连接到你的手臂上。不幸的是，你现在可以自己去整更多的。去找一处铁砧去锻造你的虹吸爪，希望它不会反客为主...
Texts.Eng: That looks a bit... gross. In any case, I've condensed it into a bundle of nerves that you can attach to your arm. You can now make more yourself, unfortunately. Go and build the Siphon in an anvil, and hope it doesn't control you...

Texts.Chs: 你对毒物的神秘渴望显然也毒害了我的电路。在我短暂的腐败状态中,我设计出了一张奇异的武器蓝图. 我的研究表明,其所需的材料来自^green;寄生虫和黏糊糊的怪物。^reset;^white;
Texts.Eng: Your uncanny desire to poison everything has apparently poisoned my circuits as well. In my brief state of corruption, schematics for a dubious weapon were created. I believe the research shows that the required materials drop from ^green;parasitic or gooey monsters.^reset;^white;
